creator: donaldp@apache.org
text:
It should be able to typedef a type by just pointed at a directory in which 
classes reside (ie build/classes) so that it is easy to integrate tasks into 
build process.

I don't think I understand what you want Ant to do.

Point to a directory and then Ant should do what?

* Grab all classes and see whether they have a public no-arg execute method.  If
so <taskdef> it (under what name?)

* If above is false, <typedef> it (under what name?).

This cannot really be what you are asking for.
